attributes.action: UK Government Financial benefits scheme for Motor Neurone Disease Suffers (MND).
attributes.additional_details: There is currently no financial help from the UK government for MND suffers in the UK. There are several charities set up in the UK,  but the financial help from these charities are selective and often not financially enough to help people/families suffering this horrific disease.
attributes.background: To implement a UK Government Financial Support program for Motor Neurone Disease Suffers (MND).  A financial benefit scheme for any UK citizen regardless of their age, demographic or financial assets.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.  There are already a range of benefits available. You can find out more here: 

https://www.mndassociation.org/support-and-information/health-and-social-care-services-for-mnd/benefits-and-financial-support/

If you'd like something else, or something in addition to these, you could start a new petition clearly setting out what.  If you'd like some help starting your petition, you can contact us on petitionscommittee@parliament.uk 

If you do start a new petition, you'll need to use your full name. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
